    Phase margin from open-loop gain and phase at crossover.
    static double
    riseTime(double wn, double zeta)
    Rise time estimate for second-order system. t_r ≈ (π - φ) / ωd where φ = acos(ζ)
    static double
    secondOrderStepResponse(double wn, double zeta, double t)
    Second-order system step response (underdamped). y(t) = 1 - (1/√(1-ζ²)) * e^(-ζωn*t) * sin(ωd*t + φ)
    static double
    settlingTime(double wn, double zeta)
    Settling time (2% criterion). t_s ≈ 4 / (ζ * ωn)
    static double
    steadyStateError(double Kp)
    Steady-state error for type 0 system with step input. e_ss = 1 / (1 + Kp)

      public ControlSystems()

  • Method Details

    • firstOrderStepResponse

      public static double firstOrderStepResponse(double K, double tau, double t)
      First-order system step response. y(t) = K * (1 - e^(-t/τ))

    • secondOrderStepResponse

      public static double secondOrderStepResponse(double wn, double zeta, double t)
      Second-order system step response (underdamped). y(t) = 1 - (1/√(1-ζ²)) * e^(-ζωn*t) * sin(ωd*t + φ)

    • riseTime

      public static double riseTime(double wn, double zeta)
      Rise time estimate for second-order system. t_r ≈ (π - φ) / ωd where φ = acos(ζ)

    • peakTime

      public static double peakTime(double wn, double zeta)
      Peak time for second-order underdamped system. t_p = π / ωd

    • overshoot

      public static double overshoot(double zeta)
      Overshoot percentage. %OS = 100 * e^(-ζπ/√(1-ζ²))

    • settlingTime

      public static double settlingTime(double wn, double zeta)
      Settling time (2% criterion). t_s ≈ 4 / (ζ * ωn)

    • steadyStateError

      public static double steadyStateError(double Kp)
      Steady-state error for type 0 system with step input. e_ss = 1 / (1 + Kp)

    • phaseMargin

      public static double phaseMargin(double phaseAtCrossover)
      Phase margin from open-loop gain and phase at crossover. PM = 180° + phase at gain crossover

    • gainMargin

      public static double gainMargin(double gainAtPhaseCrossover)
      Gain margin in dB. GM = -20*log10(gain at phase crossover)

    • firstOrderMagnitude

      public static double firstOrderMagnitude(double K, double omega, double omegaCutoff)
      Bode magnitude for first-order system. |H(jω)| = K / sqrt(1 + (ω/ωc)²)

    • firstOrderPhase

      public static double firstOrderPhase(double omega, double omegaCutoff)
      Bode phase for first-order system. ∠H(jω) = -atan(ω/ωc)
